Tyler one of the most exciting features that are part of this lat a latest
release is a technology we call database sharting and you know for those of you
who have been building acabas systems that are using actors that have entity
persistence with clustering um when you design your
entity that entity historically has been uh persisted through a single database
and there are multiple tables within that database and and our customers have been able to use relational databases or
nosql databases like Cassandra or silid DB as the backing persistence store on
this and so um the performance of the overall system uh to a certain degree is
bounded by the right throughput of that single entity to that single database um
one of the capabilities that we introduced is that you can now Shard a single
entity um uh and have different portions effectively different records quote
unquote records of that entity uh written to actually different database
instances and you can have up to 1,024 database instances for a single
entity type and so um since the rights on an entity are lock free ainn only

ey op throughput on the right persistence for a single entity um uh
